item.title: GDP Growth
item.description: GDP Growth library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(ggplot2) library(viridis) ## Loading required package: viridisLite #library(hrbrthemes) #library(tree) #library(treemapify) gdp_2015 <- read.csv("data/gdp_production_2015.csv") %>% select(Sector, CODE1, PERIOD, DTVAL_CO) %>% arrange(desc(PERIOD, CODE1)) %>% mutate(DTVAL_CO_LAG = lead(DTVAL_CO, 44)) %>% mutate(QoQ = round((DTVAL_CO/DTVAL_CO_LAG-1)*100,1)) %>% filter(PERIOD>="2016-03-31", CODE1!=1) %>% group_by(PERIOD) %>% mutate(share = DTVAL_CO_LAG/sum(DTVAL_CO_LAG)) %>% mutate(share_qoq = round(QoQ*share,1)) %>% mutate(growth = ifelse(share_qoq<0, "negative", "positive")) gdp_plot <- ggplot( data = gdp_2015, aes( x = PERIOD, y = share_qoq, fill = Sector ) ) + geom_bar( stat = "identity", position = "stack", ) + labs(title = "GROSS DOMESTIC GROWTH", subtitle = "Quarterly YoY Growth (%)", x="", y="", caption = "@sansar_b, Data Source: National Statistic Office Of Mongolia") + theme_classic() + theme( #plot.
